title: [survey] Information Architecture in Higher Education 2009
content:
[Information Architecture in Higher Education 2009](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019150105/http:/www.surveymonkey.com/s.aspx?sm=2J_2brtOiJwxTDey_2fejJsCOA_3d_3d)  
 If you are a teacher and/or researcher in Higher Education Institutions and Universities, please take five minutes to fill out the survey.

author: Alessandro Segalini
